title: Service Health Monitoring & Auto-Recovery
description:
Implement automatic health monitoring and recovery for dependent services (Redis, RT-DETRv2, Nemotron).

## Goals
1. Detect when services go offline via periodic health checks
2. Automatically restart failed services with exponential backoff
3. Surface service status to users via WebSocket + dashboard alerts
4. Support both shell scripts (dev) and Docker (prod) via strategy pattern

## Architecture
- ServiceManager abstraction with Shell/Docker implementations
- ServiceHealthMonitor background service in main.py
- Configurable health check interval (default 15s)
- Exponential backoff: 5s → 10s → 20s, max 3 retries
- WebSocket broadcast for real-time status updates

## Acceptance Criteria
- All three services (Redis, RT-DETRv2, Nemotron) monitored
- Failed services automatically restart
- Dashboard shows service status alerts
- Clean switch between shell/docker via config
- Unit and integration tests with >90% coverage
